page.title: 17A Working Man's Day
page.content: My dad gets up at 6 0 clock and gets dressed ready for work.He has his breakfast and puts his boots on.He sets off for work about 6.15 and picks up some more people on his way. He getsto Romsey about 6.25 and starts work.My dad is a bricklayer,His job is full time. He has his dinner about 2.30 he has it at work.He comes home about 5.00,sometimes 5.30 if he's working at Basingstoke or Winchester and has his tea. After tea he goes down the allotment to do some gardeing.He comes home about 7.15 from the allotment and he watches television for an hour.He goes out for a drink and he comes back about 11.00 and he's ready for the next day.
